home.title: Welcome to the Jira Project Automation App!
home.description1: Configure your new project in a few steps and let the app handle the rest.
home.feature1: Quick generation of projects in Jira
home.feature2: Automatic addition of sprints, epics, and tasks
home.feature3: Assigning tasks to epics and sprints
home.feature4: You can create a new project or use your existing one
home.description3: Simply fill in the basic information in the form, and the app will take care of creating all the necessary elements in Jira
